Movie.Title: Blade Runner
Movie.Writer: Hampton Fancher (screenplay), David Webb Peoples (screenplay), Philip K. Dick (novel)
Movie.Actors: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young, Edward James Olmos
Movie.Plot: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.
Movie.Language: English, German, Cantonese, Japanese, Hungarian, Arabic
Movie.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 12 wins & 16 nominations.
